answers.answer: My cousins first was over 10 pounds and her second was only 6 pounds.
Did you have gestational diabetes the first time?
No I didn't have gestational diabetes, only thing I had going against me was she sucked me dry of iron and energy. I was in iron supplements the lady half of the pregnancy to prevent anemia
I would discuss your 1st pregnancy history with your doctor and ask them your question about baby #2.My My first was small but ##2 seems to be larger.

question: My daughter (first baby) was giant at birth 10lb 12oz and my dr had no clue.Based on my belly size and the amount of fluid I lost when my water broke they estimated 7lb max. Is there any way to know if I'm in for another large baby?My OB stopped delivering babies after my first so I'm having to switch and not sure if my new OB will think to check my babies size since my belly doesn't get extra large.I'm all for doing another one vaginally just kinda want to know if I can have a correct estimate baby size so I know what to expect when pushing.
title: Will my second be just as big?
